class_notes:
Online synchronous with some asynchronous sessions Tuesdays 10a-12:50p.
This course is cross-listed with NRSG 522D.
course_description: Building on prior knowledge, APRN students will apply pharmacologic principles to treat common health problems, stable chronic conditions, and select acute care conditions for patients across the lifespan in a safe, cost-effective manner.
sections: Class Nbr: 5298, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: K. Mueller, Status: Open
